title: Energy and pd - electron moved from V0 to -V0

content.question: Equipotential lines for a region of space with an electric field are shown in the figure. Lines with potential values of <math alttext="positive V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mpadded></math>, <math alttext="0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn></math>, and <math alttext="negative V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> are indicated. If an electron is moved from Point <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></math> to Point <math alttext="S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></math>, what is the change in electric potential energy of the electron-field system?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
